PERSONA:
martha is a 68-year-old white woman living in a metropolitan area in the east south central region of the south. she is a high school graduate and has never pursued higher education. born and raised in the united states, martha is a citizen and has spent her entire life in the country.

martha is a married protestant and identifies as a born-again or evangelical christian. she attends religious services once or twice a month and her religious beliefs are an important part of her life. politically, martha considers herself an independent but leans towards the democratic party and holds liberal views.

coming from a middle-income household with an annual family income between $30,000 and $40,000, martha is a registered voter and takes her civic duty seriously. she uses the internet several times a week but is not an avid user.

while not actively involved in volunteer work, martha leads a simple life focused on her faith, family, and community. she values her roots in the south and the traditions that have shaped her identity over the years.
